roleset.name: run very fast
roleset.note: GALLOP-V NOTES: Ha! Deny that ArgA, if you can! (from gallop.01-v)

roles.note: Use argA for outside agent (the rider).

example.name: transitive
example.text: Right now, Mr. Hulings is waving his racing program, cheering for Karnak on the Nile, a sleek thoroughbred galloping down the home stretch.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: Right now , Mr. Hulings is waving his racing program , cheering for Karnak on the Nile , a sleek thoroughbred galloping down the home stretch .
